title: Kung.Fu.Panda.3.2016.Complete.HDRip.XVID.AC3-5.1.HQ.Hive-CM8
description:

[color=blue][size=4][b]Kung.Fu.Panda.3.2016.Complete.HDRip.XVID.AC3-5.1.HQ.Hive-CM8[/b][/size][/color]

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: 1080p Russian Itunes
Audio: Itunes English Stereo + Russian 5.1 Track


Notes:
decided to make a rip with full length from the proper new itunes version, 
it has now the ending and the movie is now longer too by 4mins

i first tried just to append the missing credits to the old release (1h19) and got a runtime of 1h31
the proper has now 1h35, maybe the old one was cut too, dont know, 
either way this one is complete

the itunes web-dl only came with stereo audio but with russian 5.1 track
like on the r5 rips i entered the english stereo into the russian 5.1 track, 
and bam now we have  5.1 track like which sounds like retail audio.

if anyone wants to use that audio to mux to the 720p or 1080p version, i dont mind

Encode:
only added sharpness


enjoy

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: AC3 5.1 @384
Sample: yes included
